column4: my router only works with linux. pelase, how can i fix this, 'cos my roommate has vista, and she can't connect to internet, and i don't want to unisntsall linux -.-'
but it seems like it is
no other computer can connect to it
yeha, but it's not only her pc =/
dod you say your roommate can get online when your computer is off?
give your roommate your cable and take hers, see if that makes any difference
well with only one cable, you can't both be online at the same time
it sounds like a vista and/or router issue, not an ubuntu issue
try plugging in the cable to her computer and to a different port on the router
sounds like a vista issue then
